TextView.android:text:
This is an info for the apps main page. 
 
 The first building produces coins, all the other buildings produce you more of the previous building. 
 
 The order of the buildings follows the arrows. 

 Tap a building to buy one if you have enough coins.

 Total tells you how many copies of a building you have and multiplies your production.

 Bought increases when you buy buildings manually, but not from automatically produced buildings

 Every 25 manually bought buildings will double the multiplier.

 Multiplier multiplies the production of the building.

 Black feet icon is for steps. Coin icon is for money.

 Energy icon is for production energy. 

 Steps give energy and every 5 energy produces money.

 Steptest button will let you add 5 steps for each tap. To test the game at a faster pace or to be able to test the program if your phone does not have a hardware step sensor. (Android Studio emulator does not emulate hardware.)

 Reset will reset your buildings back to the starting values.
